about_the_game:
This is the official soundtrack for Aurion: Legacy of the Kori-Odan.

Tracklist


  • All together [4:06]
  • City poor [2:27]
  • City rich [3:43]
  • Coup d'etat [3:49]
  • Damnation [2:19]
  • Defend yourself [2:18]
  • Forest of torment [4:44]
  • Going to attack [5:18]
  • Heart of Battle [4:43]
  • I'll become King [5:18]
  • I'm Enzo Kori-Odan [2:46]
  • Inner quest [3:51]
  • Kah Wangaa [4:00]
  • Little man [2:24]
  • Morning breeze [3:48]
  • Nothing I can do [2:08]
  • Palaver of the wise (Oriental version) [5:21]
  • Palaver of the wise [4:21]
  • Reclusion [3:04]
  • Something wrong [4:20]
  • Son of Odane [8:12]
  • There isn't chosen one [3:01]
  • Weight of the Legacy [1:25]

The Soundtrack will be placed in your Aurion: Legacy of the Kori-Odan folder in the Steam Directory: …Steam\SteamApps\common\AURION_GAME[/i]
